remax.extension-remax.bracketSpacing: Controls the printing of spaces inside object literals.
remax.extension-remax.printWidth: Fit code within this line limit.
remax.extension-remax.singleQuote: Use single instead of double quotes.
remax.extension-remax.tabWidth: Number of spaces it should use per tab.
remax.extension-remax.title: Solidity Formatter
